◆ dump()

std::string oxygine::Sprite::dump ( const dumpOptions &  opt) const
overridevirtual

Returns detailed actor information. Used for debug purposes.

Reimplemented from oxygine::Actor.

◆ isOn()

bool oxygine::Sprite::isOn ( const Vector2 &  localPosition,
float  localScale 
)
overridevirtual

Sets callback which would be called each Actor::render cycle before doRender. Use it if you don't want inherit from Actor and overload Actor::doRender.

Reimplemented from oxygine::Actor.

◆ setAnimFrame() [1/2]

void oxygine::Sprite::setAnimFrame ( const AnimationFrame &  f)

Changes sprite image

◆ setAnimFrame() [2/2]

void oxygine::Sprite::setAnimFrame ( const ResAnim *  resanim,
int  col = 0,
int  row = 0 
)

Takes AnimationFrame from ResAnim and set it as current to Sprite. Shows assert is resanim is null. Using this method is more safe than 'setAnimFrame(const AnimationFrame &f)'

◆ setManageResAnim()

void oxygine::Sprite::setManageResAnim ( bool  manage)

load/unload atlas automatically or not
